programme.desc: Resepi Moyang merupakan sebuah rancangan memasak yang mengetengahkan masakan tradisional dari serata Malaysia dan juga luar negara. Dalam Episod ini, hos akan belajar memasak masakan Vietnam iaitu Nasi Briyani Kari Kambing dan Acar Rambai. Dihoskan oleh Emilia Han.

programme.title: Girls Only S9 Ep09
programme.desc: Girls Only musim terbaru menampilkan 2 pengacara baru iaitu Leiasm dan Aqilah Azali yang akan berkongsi dengan anda tentang solekkan, dandanan rambut, pemakaian hijab dan juga akan berborak santai bersama tetamu undangan dengan topik yang menarik. Episod kali ini kita bersama Takahara dengan topik janda diusia muda.

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Jalanan S1 Ep09
programme.desc: Ikuti Suffren dan Banni dalam jelajah mereka menikmati makanan-makanan terbaik dari gerai, warung dan kedai kaki lima. Tak lupa juga, cerita-cerita jatuh bangun disebalik setiap peniaga. Untuk episod kali ini, mereka akan pergi ke AZK Roti Canai, Mee Penang Mamu Hasan, Papapopia dan Bakso Lamongan Al Barokah.

programme.title: Ekspresi Fesyen S3 Ep09
programme.desc: Ekspresi Fesyen minggu ini host Aqilah Azali akan berbual fesyen bersama Diana dari butik The Labels. Akan berkenalan dengan pereka baru Kissah dan juga kita akan disajikan dengan fesyen dari artis tempatan.

programme.title: Rojak S8 Ep05
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Leaism, beliau akan melakukan aktiviti yang tidak pernah beliau cuba, mencuba makanan baharu, dan berkongsi pengetahuan am. Selain itu, terdapat juga segmen melibatkan respondan luar iaitu Cabaran dan juga Soalan Rawak.

programme.title: Celebs Day Off S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Asmawi, anda juga akan mengenali lebih lanjut kisah kehidupan dan karier tetamu undangan Episod kali ini, Sharul Kamal.

programme.title: Huru Hara S15 Ep09
programme.desc: Di hoskan oleh Anas Ridzuan, Huru Hara kali ini pasti membuatkan anda terhibur sambil bergelak ketawa. Dalam Episod ini kita santai santai bersama barisan artis yang terdiri daripada Puspa GOmen, Zulin Aziz, Okydanial dan Najmi Niery..

programme.title: Deko Bajet S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Dengan bajet sebanyak RM2,000 sahaja,, pereka bentuk dalaman Janna Baha selaku pengacara akan menghias semula ruang bilik tidur milik Fatiha di sebuah Pangsapur di Seri Kembangan.

programme.title: Lubuk S2 Ep03
programme.desc: Rancangan khas yang akan membawa anda ke tempat menarik dari sungai hinggalah ke tempat tersembunyi untuk memancing. Kali ni, kita ke lubuk memancing di sekitar daerah Serendah bersama Joe Aziz.

programme.title: Homegrown Show S9 Ep01
programme.desc: Homegrown Show kini kembali, memaparkan persembahan muzik berlainan genre dari artis serta kugiran tanah air pada masa kini. Episod ini adalah focus kEp.ada kugiran Imran Ajmain

programme.title: Girls Only S9 Ep07
programme.desc: Girls Only musim terbaru menampilkan 2 pengacara baru iaitu Leiasm dan Aqilah Azali yang akan berkongsi dengan anda tentang solekkan, dandanan rambut, pemakaian hijab dan juga akan berborak santai bersama tetamu undangan dengan topik yang menarik. Episod kali ini kita bersama John Bear dengan topik janji temu pertama, siapa patut keluarkan belanja?

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Jalanan S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Ikuti Suffren dan Banni dalam jelajah mereka menikmati makanan-makanan terbaik dari gerai, warung dan kedai kaki lima. Kali ini, mereka akan pergi ke Nasi Berlauk Malaya, Bihun Sup Utara Daging Segenggam, Orked DChurros dan Along Western.

programme.title: Bakar S15 Ep05
programme.desc: Untuk episod kali ini, Adreena akan berkongsi dengan penonton, cara menyediakan Pic Gallette & Pic Crumble Pie.

programme.title: Ronda Roda S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Ronda Roda kali ini, menampilkan kereta Suzuki Swift Sport, Toyota KE70 dan Triumph Thruxton 900 dan juga kereta Raja Naquiddin, Toyota KE70. Jangan lupa Raja Susrina membawa gaya dia pemakaian dan motor cafe racer dari hasil tangannya. Dihoskan oleh Azizul Ammar.

programme.title: Huru Hara S15 Ep09
programme.desc: Di hoskan oleh Anas Ridzuan, Huru Hara kali ini pasti membuatkan anda terhibur sambil bergelak ketawa. Dalam Episod ini kita santai santai bersama barisan artis yang terdiri daripada Puspa GOmen, Zulin Aziz, Okydanial dan Najmi Niery..

programme.title: Khun Pan 2
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Kisah benar novel laris yang berkisarkan tentang sebuah keluarga yang membeli rumah hantu, dan mendapat kegerunan daripada roh penghuni rumah tersebut tanpa henti. Setelah sekian lama, mereka mengetahui bahawa rumah itu dibina di atas kubur purba. Mereka terpaksa menghabiskan setiap hari dalam ketakutan kerana mereka tiada pilihan. Isteri dan anak-anak terpaksa meninggalkan suami bersendirian di dalam rumah kerana tidak tahan dengan ketakutan yang melanda setiap malam. Bagaimanakah akhirnya, mereka akan dapat melarikan diri dari keganasan dan gangguan roh-roh rumah hantu, dengan pengakhiran yang begitu menakutkan?

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: Dua pelajar remaja jatuh cinta dan mempunyai seorang bayi. Tetapi apabila ibu bapa mereka menjauhkan mereka, keadaan menjadi kacau dan gadis itu menjadi semangat pendendam. Tetapi kadang-kadang cinta membuat seseorang buta.

programme.title: The Invoking 2
programme.desc: Walaupun beratus-ratus peristiwa paranormal yang mengganggu berlaku setiap tahun, kebanyakan pertemuan mengerikan ini tidak dilaporkan - sehingga kini. Bersaksilah ketika mangsa malang mengalami ketakutan yang tidak terkata apabila berhadapan dengan kuasa syaitan, poltergeist pembunuh dan entiti jahat lain yang mati bersedia untuk menuntut jiwa mereka . Turun ke jurang mimpi buruk yang terjaga ketika roh-roh jahat yang dahagakan darah ini berusaha untuk memiliki mangsa mereka dan menyeret mereka-menendang dan menjerit-turun ke neraka.

programme.title: 4 Tahun Tinggal Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel dan Cynthia, pasangan muda dengan anak dalam perjalanan, mengalami masa sukar di Manila. Mereka kembali ke Baguio, tempat asal Daniel, untuk memulakan semula. Melalui kebaikan Alex, kawan Daniel zaman kanak-kanak yang kaya, mereka dapat tinggal di sebuah rumah besar, tanpa sewa; dan dia mendapat tawaran kerja juga. Segala-galanya seolah-olah jatuh pada tempatnya untuk mereka - atau begitulah yang mereka fikirkan - sehingga perkara aneh mula berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Mereka perlu meyakinkan pesaing Tuan Sidek bahawa bangunan tertentu berhantu apabila mereka terperangkap di dalamnya. Kecuali mereka tidak perlu meyakinkan kerana bangunan itu benar-benar dihantui oleh roh yang tidak tenteram. Roh memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk memenuhi hasrat terakhirnya

programme.title: The Living Dead
programme.desc: Rompakan yang kecil menjadi huru-hara, apabila pencuri berakhir di istana lama dan menemui sumpahan purba yang melindungi hartanya. Entiti ghaib secara aktif cuba menghalang mereka daripada mencari emas, atau adakah mereka?

programme.title: E Cinni
programme.desc: Sebuah film thriller Turki yang mengikuti seorang wanita yang terjerat dalam permainan kejahatan setelah mendapatkan akses ke teknologi yang berbahaya.

programme.title: Azem 3
programme.desc: Seorang isteri cemburu "zehra" meragui suaminya mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan rakannya, dia merancang untuk melaksanakan sihir hitam oleh beberapa syeikh yang jahat untuk mendapatkan suaminya kembali daripada pesaingnya. Beberapa siri peristiwa hebat mula berlaku kepada rakannya berakhir dengan pembunuhan "zehra" y suaminya untuk mengelakkan skandal curang.

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Bohsia 2: Jalan Kembali
programme.desc: Filem ini merupakan sekuel kepada "Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam" pada tahun 2009. Syamsul Yusof kembali mengarahkan kisah hidup seorang bohsia yang dilakonkan oleh Nabila Huda. Tasha (Nabila Huda) adalah seorang gadis yang dibesarkan tanpa keluarga dan pendidikan, memaksanya untuk mencari perlindungan di dunia bawah tanah, di kalangan samseng jalanan. Dia tidak lama kemudian menjadi bosan dengan kehidupannya yang tidak bermakna, tetapi jalannya menuju penebusan adalah jalan yang diturap dengan banyak halangan.

programme.title: The Living Dead
programme.desc: Rompakan yang kecil menjadi huru-hara, apabila pencuri berakhir di istana lama dan menemui sumpahan purba yang melindungi hartanya. Entiti ghaib secara aktif cuba menghalang mereka daripada mencari emas, atau adakah mereka?

programme.title: The Invoking
programme.desc: Selepas mewarisi rumah daripada keluarga yang tidak pernah dikenalinya, Samantha Harris (Trin Miller) dan tiga rakannya menuju ke Sader Ridge luar bandar untuk memeriksa harta itu. Tidak lama selepas tiba, Sam mula mengalami penglihatan mengerikan tentang kekejaman ganas dan kejahatan yang tidak terkata. Diganggu oleh kuasa jahat yang mengepungnya, Sam mengalami mimpi ngeri apabila syaitan dari masa lalunya enggan terus dikebumikan lagi.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Den Budak Motor
programme.desc: Den Budak Motor mengisahkan tentang Deniel, seorang lelaki yang kecewa ditinggalkan oleh bekas kekasihnya, Sarah disebabkan kesusahan Deniel yang hanya memiliki motor kapcai.

programme.title: The Witch Part 2: The Other One
programme.desc: Selepas seorang gadis muncul sebagai satu-satunya yang terselamat dalam serbuan berdarah ke atas kemudahan penyelidikan di sebalik Program rahsia, dia diselamatkan oleh sepasang orang awam yang tidak lama kemudian menyedari bahawa lebih banyak bahaya menanti.

programme.title: Bohsia 2: Jalan Kembali
programme.desc: Filem ini merupakan sekuel kepada "Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam" pada tahun 2009. Syamsul Yusof kembali mengarahkan kisah hidup seorang bohsia yang dilakonkan oleh Nabila Huda. Tasha (Nabila Huda) adalah seorang gadis yang dibesarkan tanpa keluarga dan pendidikan, memaksanya untuk mencari perlindungan di dunia bawah tanah, di kalangan samseng jalanan. Dia tidak lama kemudian menjadi bosan dengan kehidupannya yang tidak bermakna, tetapi jalannya menuju penebusan adalah jalan yang diturap dengan banyak halangan.

programme.title: Daddyku Gangster
programme.desc: Ray ialah ketua geng mencuri kereta mewah, dan terlibat dalam kelab petarungan bawah tanah. Dia tidak mempunyai hubungan yang baik dengan keluarganya, tetapi apabila abangnya Remy dan isteri Remy meninggal dunia dalam satu kemalangan yang tragis, Ray terkejut kerana abangnya telah menyatakan niatnya dalam wasiat dan telah memilih Ray untuk menjadi penjaganya. dua orang anak - Arisha dan Aidil.

programme.title: 3AM Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Pesta Hantu Lapar sudah hampir. Seorang pekerja baru di telah menyinggung perasaan hantu di bangunan pejabatnya kerana dia tidak hormat kepada roh pada hari pertamanya bekerja. Semasa menjalani syif malam, lelaki itu dan rakan sekerjanya yang bekerja lebih masa mengalami pertemuan menyeramkan yang membuatkan mereka merenung tingkah laku dan kepercayaan mereka.

programme.title: Hantu Bungkus VS Pontianak
programme.desc: Sebuah filem seram komedi lakonan Osman Kering, Rosli Rahman Adam, Fetty Dzul dan Emma Akma

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Bohsia 2: Jalan Kembali
programme.desc: Filem ini merupakan sekuel kepada "Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam" pada tahun 2009. Syamsul Yusof kembali mengarahkan kisah hidup seorang bohsia yang dilakonkan oleh Nabila Huda. Tasha (Nabila Huda) adalah seorang gadis yang dibesarkan tanpa keluarga dan pendidikan, memaksanya untuk mencari perlindungan di dunia bawah tanah, di kalangan samseng jalanan. Dia tidak lama kemudian menjadi bosan dengan kehidupannya yang tidak bermakna, tetapi jalannya menuju penebusan adalah jalan yang diturap dengan banyak halangan.

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong
programme.desc: Tom yum goong (2005) ialah filem Thai,Inggeris,Mandarin,Vietnam. Prachya Pinkaew telah mengarahkan filem ini. Tony Jaa,Nathan Jones,Xing Jin,Petchtai Wongkamlao adalah pelakon filem ini. Ia telah dikeluarkan pada tahun 2005. Tom yum goong (2005) dianggap sebagai salah satu filem Aksi, Jenayah, Drama, Thriller terbaik di India dan di seluruh dunia.

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: Dua pelajar remaja jatuh cinta dan mempunyai seorang bayi. Tetapi apabila ibu bapa mereka menjauhkan mereka, keadaan menjadi kacau dan gadis itu menjadi semangat pendendam. Tetapi kadang-kadang cinta membuat seseorang buta.

programme.title: The Living Dead
programme.desc: Rompakan yang kecil menjadi huru-hara, apabila pencuri berakhir di istana lama dan menemui sumpahan purba yang melindungi hartanya. Entiti ghaib secara aktif cuba menghalang mereka daripada mencari emas, atau adakah mereka?

programme.title: Ratu Ilmu Hitam
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga diganggu di rumah anak yatim. Seseorang mahu mereka mati, dengan ilmu hitam yang sangat mematikan. Dia mempunyai dendam dan dia juga dilahirkan kerana dosa anak-anak yatim yang membentuknya menjadi Ratu Ilmu Hitam.

programme.title: Mercury Man
programme.desc: Selepas memberus dirinya dengan bahan pelik, rata-rata anggota bomba berubah menjadi sesuatu yang jauh lebih hebat daripada dirinya seperti Mercury Man. Dikurniakan kuasa besar yang hebat, dia kini akan menggunakan kebolehannya untuk membantu menakluki kuasa jahat.

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: Seorang pegawai polis yang ditukarkan dalam polis Marseilles ditugaskan untuk menumpaskan sekumpulan perompak Itali yang memandu Ferrari berkuasa bersama anak saudara Daniel yang lebih tua, seorang pemandu yang teruk yang mendapat teksi putih legenda.

programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: Sekumpulan rakan mendedahkan objek dunia lain di padang luar bandar yang mereka temui menyimpan rahsia yang lebih besar daripada yang mereka bayangkan.

programme.title: KL Special Forces
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sekumpulan pasukan unit polis khas yang diketuai oleh Roslan yang telah cuba menjatuhkan kumpulan samun yang diketuai oleh seorang lelaki bernama Asyraff. Geng itu digelar 'Geng Anarkis' dan terkenal dengan rancangan dan taktik bijak mereka dalam rompakan bank untuk mengelirukan polis. Pada masa yang sama seorang anggota polis muda bernama Zul telah diambil untuk menyertai pasukan khas. Keadaan menjadi lebih rumit apabila Asyraff, ketua kumpulan samseng itu menjeling untuk memanipulasi fikiran kedua-dua Roslan dan Zul. Pada masa yang sama, Roslan berdepan masalah dalam perkahwinannya kerana sukar untuk mengimbangi keluarga dan pekerjaan. Zul mengalami masalah yang sama dengan tunang yang kebetulan anak kepada pemilik Bank Damofa yang menjadi sasaran utama perompak kumpulan itu. Rahsia gelap akan terbongkar apabila mereka bergerak untuk rompakan seterusnya? Adakah pasukan unit khas mampu menjatuhkan Asyraff?

programme.title: Rambo Last Blood
programme.desc: Kehidupan damai John Rambo terganggu apabila Gabriela, cucu kawannya, hilang di Mexico. Dia memutuskan untuk membebaskannya daripada cengkaman kartel tempatan, memulakan kitaran membalas dendam.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: Sekumpulan rakan mendedahkan objek dunia lain di padang luar bandar yang mereka temui menyimpan rahsia yang lebih besar daripada yang mereka bayangkan.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep62
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Habis Dia Terbitlah Kamu
programme.desc: Kedatangan Dafa di hadapan Rani menimbulkan masalah untuk Rani, bagaimana tidak? Ternyata Dafa melarikan diri ke bengkel tempat Rani bekerja untuk menghindari pacar bekas gadis yang pernah dekat dengannya. Akibatnya, Rani terpaksa membantu Dafa melarikan diri.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep80
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Aku Yang Dinikahi, Dia Yang Dinafkahi
programme.desc: Maura nampaknya membuat kesalahan dalam memilih suami seperti Marchel yang lebih memperhatikan bekas isterinya yang bernama Lidya. Dengan berbohong tentang penyakit kanser, Lidya berjaya merampas harta Marchel. Sebenarnya Maura mengetahui tentang rancangan licik Lidya dan mencuba untuk membongkarinya, tetapi Marchel masih mempercayai Lidya. Bagaimanakah kelanjutan kisah keluarga Maura dan March

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep164
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep10

Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep80
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep10
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep63
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep164
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep10
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep80

programme.title: Aku Yang Dinikahi, Dia Yang Dinafkahi
programme.desc: Maura nampaknya membuat kesalahan dalam memilih suami seperti Marchel yang lebih memperhatikan bekas isterinya yang bernama Lidya. Dengan berbohong tentang penyakit kanser, Lidya berjaya merampas harta Marchel. Sebenarnya Maura mengetahui tentang rancangan licik Lidya dan mencuba untuk membongkarinya, tetapi Marchel masih mempercayai Lidya. Bagaimanakah kelanjutan kisah keluarga Maura dan March

programme.title: Aku Selalu Dianggap Salah Karena Suamiku Merasa Kalah
programme.desc: Hendri sepatutnya bersyukur kerana mempunyai isteri seperti Mutia yang menerimanya apa adanya. Tetapi, Hendri justru tidak menghargai kebaikan Mutia yang telah membiayai pendidikannya. Yang lebih parah, Hendri juga berselingkuh dengan teman kuliahnya yang membuat Mutia kesal dan meminta berpisah dengan Hendri. Bagaimana kisah selanjutnya dalam rumah tangga mereka?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep166
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. programme.title: Tamu Idola Ep1
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan realiti yang mengejutkan di mana artis memasuki dunia peminat mereka, dengan mengunjungi mereka secara tiba-tiba. Penonton dapat melihat momen intim ketika artis terlibat dalam rutinitas rutin harian dan pengalaman para peminat setia mereka.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Shades Of The Heart
programme.desc: Novelist who just get divorced wish to write a novel based on his life. In the process, he met people with stories about the past, memory and death. These encounters caused a change in his thoughts...

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: The Player 2: Master of Swindlers Ep1
programme.desc: <Player> returns with Season 2! 5 elite con artists join hands to catch lawbreakers who get away with crime by money and power.

programme.title: The Player 2: Master of Swindlers Ep2
programme.desc: <Player> returns with Season 2! 5 elite con artists join hands to catch lawbreakers who get away with crime by money and power.

programme.title: GBRB: reap what you sow Ep4
programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote FARM while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: World Dice Tour2 Ep11

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep500
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep3738
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep54
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep940941
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep724
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3426
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4883

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep62
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1000
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions; Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead Ultimate Power
programme.desc: In this kung fu vampire sequel, a Shaolin monk takes on a Taoist-priest-turns-evil-vampire to stop his killing spree.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men 2
programme.desc: Continuing from Ah Boys to Men, Ken returns to barracks, determined to change because of his bedridden father, and becomes a model recruit. However, his comrades think Ken wants to flatter and show off only, and repel him. Although Ken wants to explain, misunderstanding gets deepen through days. Can they unite and overcome the challenge together?

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Flying Dragon Leaping Tiger
programme.desc: Lu the horse thief is betrayed by his best mate Qiao and is separated from his son. Lus wife blames him for it and takes Qiaos daughter away as revenge. For 20 years, Lu searches for his wife until one day, his missing son meets Qiaos daughter and they fall in love. Will their hatred pass on to the next generation?

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughters company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Captain

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: The Green Hornet

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: The one girl threatening the Evil Queens reign has been training in the art of war with the very Huntsman dispatched to kill her. Evil now fights destiny.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels

programme.title: War

programme.title: Dead Man Down

programme.desc: In the final weeks of the pioneering Flinders sleep trial, Dr Michael Mosley's lifelong insomnia starts to shift and the sleep campaign gathers in momentum in Canberra.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Discover just how much cream it takes to make premium toffee; what ingredients make delectable vegan-friendly pesto; why five seconds can be the deciding factor in making the perfect cup of coffee; and what the connection is between ice rocket lollipops and Canadian birch trees.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Discover why a chocolate bath is essential to make a perfect ice cream cone; how a new generation of sodapop lovers get their fizzy fix; why pasta needs a haircut and a blow dry before it can hit the plate; and how 17 million pieces of bubble gum get made every single day.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hawaii - Exploring Hawaii, a tropical sanctuary for any wildlife that can reach its remote shores. From humpback whales to waterfall-climbing fish, it is home to a treasure trove of wildlife.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the shadows of Sellafield, the most hazardous industrial site in western Europe, Simon meets members of the Civil Nuclear Constabulary. He's also given rare access to Sellafield's aging facilities.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Microwave - Hannah Fry discovers the hidden WWII radar technology that heats up baked beans and learns the legend of the melted candy bar in an engineer's pocket that kick-started a kitchen revolution.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - The Missing Manzi Ep3
programme.desc: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Weighs and Means Ep6
programme.desc: Beni faces his weigh-in while Alba is back in isolation. Pujon reclaims his position as gang leader. A team heads out to rescue an infant orangutan. And an unwelcome visitor prompts the staff to introduce a cautionary lesson in snake awareness.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Elephant Story Ep3
programme.desc: Once abundant on the continent, elephant populations have been drastically reduced by hunting for ivory and meat in the last 200 years. Yet there are pockets of hope for these gentle giants, found in dedicated elephant conservation reserves like Addo Elephant Park and Tembe Elephant Park in South Africa. Protected from poachers within the parks, elephant numbers are growing.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.desc: Beni faces his weigh-in while Alba is back in isolation. Pujon reclaims his position as gang leader. A team heads out to rescue an infant orangutan. And an unwelcome visitor prompts the staff to introduce a cautionary lesson in snake awareness.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Head & Neck Ep1
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Wild Coast Ep2
programme.desc: Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Kakumbi Are Vulnerable Ep4
programme.desc: Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Human Influenced Ep2
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet weve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - Handle with Care Ep7
programme.desc: Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Killer Packs Ep4
programme.desc: Surviving in the African savanna requires wit and guile, especially for two of its hunters: African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses. These two enigmatic species live in packs and rely on well-coordinated teamwork to succeed. From looking after youngsters to finding food and warding off enemies, both species rely on their tight-knit families to overcome the challenges of everyday life.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
